questions.output: Is there signs of any unusual suspect behavior?
questions.additionalOutput: Drinking alchol, smoking, burning matches, defecation, handling of female undergarments, made themselves at home, urination, used gloves, mask, telephone, tissue/towels, weapons, graffiti, vandalism

Point of exit
Photograph scene.
